means: 不仁慈的，无情的，残酷的

sentence.Network_en: You have a vicious, greedy, unmerciful financial wolf standing over a cowering, unsophisticated commercial lamb.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们看到了一只凶恶的 、 贪婪的 、 残忍的金融狼,俯视着一只畏缩的 、 朴实的商业羊.

sentence.Network_en: R: unmerciful mire, lick up the most lovely person in the world!
sentence.Network_cn: 罗密欧: 你无情的泥, 吞噬了世上最可爱的人!

sentence.Network_en: They chatted for an unmerciful length of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们聊了一个过分长的时间.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unmentionable 不宜说出口的unmerciful 无情的unmerited 无功受禄的
unmedulated 无髓的unmerciful 不仁慈的unmethodical 不讲的
unmerciful mire lick up the most lovely person in the world !, 你无情的泥 , 吞噬了世上最可爱的人!

list.abs: his caritative articles well expressed his loyalty to the unmerciful world and his role of lover to the inconstant daily life . no one devotes his love to the world than him .他饱蘸博爱的浓墨为世界这个无情者书写着忠诚，为反复无常的生活充当着情人，没有谁像他那样对世界奉献着爱。
make unmerciful demands on a person's time [ money ]对某人的时间[金钱]作不合理的要求
They chatted for an unmerciful length of time ., 他们聊了一个过分长的时间.

auth_sentence.content: Until Maupertuis' death...Voltaire did not relent in his flood of unmerciful, unscrupulous...ridicule.
